AHRQ: Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality
DIRECT: is not an acronym! a way to communicate securely
DICOM: The Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine http://dicom.nema.org/
EHR: Electronic Health Record (system in hospital that uses EMR)
EMR: Electronic Medical Record (digital record vs paper record)
HISP: Health ISP (Internet Service Provider) usually providing DIRECT services
HIPAA: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
MDM: Master Data Management (e.g. golden source of truth)
NCPDP: National Council for Prescription Drug Programs http://www.ncpdp.org/
Rx: data format standard (used by SureScripts, etc)
OBE: (Overtaken By Events) In other words, 'too late'.
OOB: does NOT stand for 'Out of Bed.' It stands for 'Open Of Business.' (Opposite of COB.)
SOAP: Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine â€“ Clinical Terms
VDT: View Download Transmit (MU2 requirement for patient health record)
